document_data.caption: Sir Ftucis of Skull Crag<ref group="note">Portraits and dialogue box images used in ''[[Forgotten Realms: Unlimited Adventures]]'' are all from previous games in the series as well as licensed art from [[TSR, Inc.]] catalogue. This lightly altered image was originally from ''Gazetteer 4: The Kingdom of Ierendi'' cover.
document_data.name: Ftucis
document_data.mainbody: '''Sir Ftucis''' was the Training Master of the [[Roadwarden Guard]], stationed in the [[Skull Crag Keep]] in the [[Storm Horn Mountains]] of [[Cormyr]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Ftucis was an older, grizzled male warrior with long gray hair.
document_data.History: By the early [[1360 DR|1360s DR]], Sir Ftucis was already an aging experienced soldier who trained the Roadwarden Guard in the Skull Crag Keep. He offered his martial training sessions to guests of the keep. Shortly after the death of the hero Roadwarden [[Arelin Starbrow]], Sir Ftucis made his services available to the group of caravan guards who aided the keep's soldiers against a monster horde that threatened the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]].
